projects.title: Multi Modal Listing (MML)
projects.description: Led development of an AI-enhanced product listing feature in Android using server-based and on-device AI models. Reduced listing time and improved seller acquisition. Involved integrating AI models on the device to expedite the listing process. Ensured code quality through robust testing.

projects.title: Carousell AI Hackathon
projects.description: Led team to victory, developing an innovative solution using generative AI and OCR to automate product attribute extraction. This enhanced user experience and improved listing accuracy.

projects.title: Carousel Property Finding Hackathon
projects.description: Developed an algorithm for efficient property matching based on user preferences, enhancing search relevance and user engagement.

projects.title: Android App Modernization at VMware
projects.description: Refactored large Java codebases to Kotlin, introduced Room DB, improved test coverage and CI/CD pipelines, and enforced architectural best practices. This resulted in a 30% reduction in bugs and a 20% increase in app performance. Enhanced developer productivity and reduced technical debt by promoting clean code principles.

projects.title: Resource Reservation System
projects.description: Contributed to a team that developed a patented system that involved efficiently reserving physical resources based on physical identifiers.

patents.title: Reserving physical resources based upon a physical identifier

certifications_or_extras.education: Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Communication, PESIT, VTU
journals_or_publications: Bottom Navigation and Navigation Drawer Using Scaffold from Jetpack Compose

questions.question: Explain your experience with Django and DRF. What are some of the challenges you faced, and how did you overcome them?
Describe a time when you had to optimize database queries in a Django application. What tools or techniques did you use?
How would you implement authentication and authorization in a RESTful API using Django REST Framework?
Explain your experience with writing unit and integration tests for backend APIs.
How would you design a system to handle a large number of concurrent requests to your API?
Have you worked with Celery or other message queues? If so, describe a use case.
Given a list of integers, write a function to find the largest product of three integers.
